Package Model.entities

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Model.entities.Player
public class Player extends Object
Class that represent a player with all items connected to him

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String name, List<PrivateObjective> privateObjective)
      Construct a player with some initial parameters
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of the player that is going to be created
      privateObjective - is the list of private objectives given randomly to the player

      Set to true the value of variable isConnected

      Set to false the value of variable isConnected

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected()
      Returns:
      true if the player is connected, false otherwise

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns:
      the name of the player

    • getTotalPoints

      public Point getTotalPoints()
      Returns:
      the sum of the points that belongs to the player

    • getPrivateObjectivesID

      public List<Integer> getPrivateObjectivesID()
      Returns:
      a list of integer that represent the IDs of the private objective linked to the player

    • getShelf

      public Shelf getShelf()
      Returns:
      the object Shelf associated to the player

    • getPoints

      public List<Point> getPoints()
      Returns:
      the points of the player as a list, with the corresponding origin

    • givePoint

      public void givePoint(Point point)
      Add a point to the list
      Parameters:
      point - is the point object that will be added to the point's list of the player

    • hasAlreadyGotCommonPoints

      public boolean hasAlreadyGotCommonPoints(int ID)
      Checks if the player have already completed the common objective chosen
      Parameters:
      ID - is the ID of the common objective to check
      Returns:
      true if the player has already completed the common objective, false otherwise

    • getPrivatePoint

      public List<Point> getPrivatePoint()
      Returns:
      a list of points given by the private objectives

    • getTotalPrivatePoints

      public Point getTotalPrivatePoints()
      Returns:
      the sum of points given by the private objectives

    • getPrivateObjectivePattern

      public List<Card.Type[][]> getPrivateObjectivePattern()
      Checks all the private objectives pattern of the player and creates a list with them
      Returns:
      the patterns of the private objectives as a list

    • getShelfGroups

      public List<Integer> getShelfGroups()
      Returns:
      a list of integers representing the various groups of cards of the same type
